law.catch_line: A lessor shall provide the consumer with a written receipt for each payment under a rental-purchase ...

text.section: A lessor shall provide the consumer with a written receipt for each payment under a rental-purchase agreement made in person by cash or money order, or, if the payment is made in any other form, on request.

The written receipt shall contain the:
Total amount paid;
Total amount due that week or month; and
Total remaining rental payments necessary to acquire ownership of the item.
The lessor shall provide the consumer with a written statement of account within 3 days after the consumer's request.
